message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to present you with an opportunity to acquire a highly valuable product that I believe would greatly benefit you. After careful consideration and evaluation, I am offering you the chance to purchase this product at a special introductory price of $12,000. This price reflects not only the intrinsic value of the product but also the unique benefits it offers to individuals like yourself. I trust that you will find its features and capabilities to be well worth the investment. Please let me know if you have any questions or if you're interested in proceeding with this offer.
